page.title: 15Law and order
page.content: Vandalism There has been a general rise in the amount of vandalism in the area.The local magistrates court has to deal with many more cases of young offenders.The local police force have a close liaison with the local schools,with officers calling in to explain about the need for law and order. Films about child molesting have also been shown by school liaison officers. The constabulary are also to be seen organising recreation activities for schoolchildren and at the same time stressing the need for closer co-operation between the cmmunity and the police to overcome vandalism.
